00031 #ifndef OPENVDB_POINTS_VERSION_HAS_BEEN_INCLUDED
00032 #define OPENVDB_POINTS_VERSION_HAS_BEEN_INCLUDED
00033 
00034 #include <openvdb/version.h>
00035 
00037 #ifndef IGNORE_HDK_DEPRECATIONS
00038 #define IGNORE_HDK_DEPRECATIONS
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 // Library major, minor and patch version numbers
00042 #define OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_MAJOR_VERSION_NUMBER 0
00043 #define OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_MINOR_VERSION_NUMBER 1
00044 #define OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_PATCH_VERSION_NUMBER 0
00045 
00050 #define OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_VERSION_STRING "0.1.0"
00051 
00053 #define OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_VERSION_NUMBER \
00054     ((OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_MAJOR_VERSION_NUMBER << 24) | \
00055     ((OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_MINOR_VERSION_NUMBER & 0xFF) << 16) | \
00056     (OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_PATCH_VERSION_NUMBER & 0xFFFF))
00057 
00058 namespace openvdb {
00059 OPENVDB_USE_VERSION_NAMESPACE
00060 namespace OPENVDB_VERSION_NAME {
00061 
00062 namespace points {
00063 
00064 // Library major, minor and patch version numbers
00065 const uint32_t
00066     OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_MAJOR_VERSION = OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_MAJOR_VERSION_NUMBER,
00067     OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_MINOR_VERSION = OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_MINOR_VERSION_NUMBER,
00068     OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_PATCH_VERSION = OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_PATCH_VERSION_NUMBER;
00070 const uint32_t OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_VERSION = OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_VERSION_NUMBER;
00071 
00072 
00074 inline const char* getLibraryVersionString() { return OPENVDB_POINTS_LIBRARY_VERSION_STRING; }
00075 
00076 } // namespace points
00077 
00078 } // namespace OPENVDB_VERSION_NAME
00079 } // namespace openvdb
